message1: You are heartily welcome to Valley Multi Education Network Consultancy Pvt. Ltd. We are proud to share the fact that our team of research and educational experts have spent a decade long successful journey of providing quality educational services to all the valued clients establishing Valley Multi as one of the most promising, reliable and the most reputed educational institutions in Nepal.
message2: We are excited that we have been one of the most trusted and chosen iconic study abroad consultancies by the prospective students desiring to study abroad in the recent years. Our strong faculty of expert and experienced study abroad counselors, well-trained documentation officers and visa application officers are always committed and decided to offering you with most effective counseling or guidance on choosing the most suitable education provider and course as per your desire and financial affordability, the support and guidance for error free documentation and effective interview preparation ensuring your visa success finally.
message3:
Our primary focus is to guide you throughly for Diploma, Undergraduate and Postgraduate education in Japan and Korea. Apart from this we are also well-recognized and successful consultants for student visa of Japan, the USA, Canada, Australia and some other Schengen countries of Europe. 
  At Valley, we value and understand the role of quality education and the role of consultants in helping our clients smooth the path to a prosperous academic career abroad. Hence, think success, think Valley!
